wms_article.title: Luxury platform Balaan selects AAK as preferred bidder

wms_article_body.body: Balaan, a South Korean online luxury goods platform undergoing court-led restructuring, has entered the acquisition process just four months after initiating rehabilitation proceedings. The company announced Monday that it has received court approval from the Seoul Bankruptcy Court to name Asia Advisors Korea (AAK) as the provisional preferred bidder under a pre-packaged M&A process. A public notice for the sale will be issued later this month, with a final acquirer expected to be confirmed as early as September. The value of AAKâ€™s offer was not disclosed. If no higher bid is submitted during the open auction process, or if AAK matches a competing bid, it will be granted priority rights and formally designated as the acquirer.
